survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for Plant-Based Food Products
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from consumers on their satisfaction and preferences regarding plant-based food products to help improve product offerings and customer experience.

questions.question_text: How often do you purchase plant-based food products?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity and ease of response.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE. Ensure all options are mutually exclusive.

script.question_text: How often do you purchase plant-based food products?

questions.question_text: Which types of plant-based food products do you typically purchase? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Dairy alternatives (e.g., almond milk, soy yogurt)
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Daily', 'Weekly', 'Monthly', or 'Occasionally' to Q1
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-select. Ensure the options cover common product categories.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE. Allow multiple selections.

script.question_text: Which types of plant-based food products do you typically purchase? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Dairy alternatives (e.g., almond milk, soy yogurt)
script.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Daily', 'Weekly', 'Monthly', or 'Occasionally' to Q1

questions.question_text: What factors influence your decision to purchase plant-based food products? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Daily', 'Weekly', 'Monthly', or 'Occasionally' to Q1
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-select. Include a broad range of potential influences.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE. Allow multiple selections.

script.question_text: What factors influence your decision to purchase plant-based food products? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Daily', 'Weekly', 'Monthly', or 'Occasionally' to Q1

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the taste of plant-based food products you have tried?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Daily', 'Weekly', 'Monthly', or 'Occasionally' to Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for measuring satisfaction levels.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE. Ensure the scale is balanced.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the taste of plant-based food products you have tried?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Daily', 'Weekly', 'Monthly', or 'Occasionally' to Q1

questions.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in plant-based food products?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-ended text field to capture detailed feedback. Limit response length to 500 characters.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: OPEN_TEXT. Provide a text box with character limit.
